TextView.android:text: We're here to help you to navigate our app for buyying ,selling and posting product. Below, you'll find detailed instruction and answers to common questions.

1.Access your profile section; navigate to the 'profile' section, which can be found in the main menu or dashboard always represnted by user icon.

2.In the profile view look for an Edit button tap it to modify your profile details.

3.Edit profile information
>>Name: modify your name if it has changes or contain an error.
\>>Email :update your email address to ensure your receive important notification.
>>Phone number: change your contact number to the current one.
>>Address:update your physical address for accurate deliver and accurate correspondence.
>>profile picture: Tap on profile picture section to upload or capture a new photo.

4.Changing password: navigate to the changing password section within the profile section.
>>Enter your current password then enter new one.
>>Confirm a new password then save the changes.

5.Saving the changes: After making a necessarey update tap the 'save' button to apply the changes, A confirmation message will appear indicating your profile have been saccessfully updated.
